## Things You Have to Do

Carrie is providing the hotel and transportation but you still have to do a few things.

### Block out the dates March 22-26.

### IMPORTANT :Fill Out This Form ASAP

To reserve a seat on the private jet you must enter your personal and passport info [HERE.](https://anguillareservations.wufoo.com/forms/zm5y9yy13jy0yr/ "Link to air transport reservation form.") Where it asks hotel reservation number enter N/A. The departure airport is "HPN" and the arrival is "AXA" Round trip, of course. For passenger email, use "carebearnyc\@gmail.com." We can't reserve your seat on the private jet until this form is submitted!

### Arrange your own transportation to [Westchester County Airport](https://maps.app.goo.gl/Xz9H3jVXMwtV3DuD7) on March 22.
